entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 2.

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending before morning then cloudy. Showers along parts of the coast overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 28 December 2022
